title: Bug 118780: Incorrect column names shown in expression builder after alias is set for dataset columns
description: When setting aliases for columns in a dataset, the expression builder still shows the old column names instead of the aliases when the dataset is selected.
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases that have been set.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset. 
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset (e.g., 'column1'). 
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 
4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset. Verify that the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases.
